name: Gunslinger Glitch
description:
(This game is pretty ugly and small - so fair warning lol.)

A quickdraw duel against cutting edge A.I. - can you tell which faces are human, and which are synthesized? Put your draw speed an psychological skills to the test.

You will meet gunslingers with the photos and quotes of real humans,  and amongst them, traitorous androids with generated photos and quotes.

The photos are created with a hyper-GAN and the text was generated with OpenApi's GPT-3.

This game was created as part of the 48hr game jam Ludum Dare #49. for the compo (single person). It was a blast to code up, and although I am very unskilled at art and music, I'm glad I was able to get it all working.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/gunslinger-glitch

https://github.com/necarlson97/gunslinger-glitch
